html.content:
Having trouble seeing this email? Click here to view in your browser.
Account Number: [AccountNumber]
[Salutation]
It’s that time of year when the blankets come out and the radiators go on. But the last thing you want is a nasty bill for unexpected boiler repairs – or to find yourself with no central heating at all.
We've partnered with one of the leading home experts HomeServe to offer you boiler cover and boiler-replacement services. With HomeServe's boiler cover, you can keep your home running smoothly.
Protect your boiler and gas supply pipe from £8 a month and get a free boiler service in your first year.*
Discover boiler cover
Does your boiler need replacing?
If your boiler has seen better days and you're thinking about getting a new one, HomeServe offers an easy boiler-replacement service. A new boiler will be more efficient, so you'll waste less energy - lowering your bills.
Other benefits you can enjoy:
Video Survey
You'll get a free, personalised video call so HomeServe's Home Experts can check out your current boiler and tell you which one is right for you.
Manufacturer-backed warranty as standard
Enjoy peace of mind with a manufacturer-backed warranty† as standard. You can also take your pick from top boiler brands, including Worcester, Bosch and Ideal.
Lower energy bills
Did you know heating makes up about 53% of your energy bill? Replacing an old G-rated boiler could save you up to £195 a year** on your energy bills.
Flexible payment plans
We understand that a new boiler is a big investment, so HomeServe has a range of flexible payment options to help you find the right boiler for your budget.
Find out more
Thanks,
The Shell Energy Team
My Account
Help
Contact Us
Manage your home energy on the go with our mobile app
Account Number: [AccountNumber)]

The Registered Office of Shell Energy Retail Limited is Shell Energy House, Westwood Business Park, Westwood Way, Coventry CV4 8HS. Registered in England and Wales. Company number 05070887.

Shell Energy Retail Limited (company number 05070887) whose registered address is at Shell Energy House, Westwood Business Park, Westwood Way, Coventry. CV4 8HS. VAT number GB 867244791. Shell Energy Retail Ltd is an appointed representative of HomeServe Membership Ltd, which is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority. HomeServe Membership Ltd (company number 2770612) whose registered address is at Cable Drive, Walsall, WS2 7BN. Financial Services Register number 312518. HomeServe Membership Limited is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority for general insurance and credit broking activities

Terms and conditions:

* Terms and Conditions apply
** Figures sourced from the Energy Saving Trust
† Subject to an annual service at the customer's expense. Warranty extension from five years to seven years or ten years, only available on Worcester Bosch and Vaillant. Warranty extension from five years to ten years available on Ideal Logic boilers. All warranty extensions are subject to an additional charge. Ten-year warranty extensions are not available on Ideal Mexico or Keston boilers.

Get help with an energy problem

Contact Citizens Advice if you need help with an energy problem - for example with your bills or meters, or if you’re struggling to pay for the energy you use. They’re the official source of free and independent energy advice and support. Go to: citizensadvice.org.uk/energy or call their consumer service on 0808 223 1133. Calls are free.

If you need to make a complaint please contact us directly through our enquiry form at shellenergy.co.uk/contact-us or customer services team on 0330 094 5800. If you remain unhappy with our resolution of your complaint, or if your complaint has not been resolved within 8 weeks of the date you told us about it, you may refer the matter to the Ombudsman Services: Energy on 0330 440 1624 or at ombudsman-services.org/sectors/energy. They are free and independent, and we are bound by their decision.

Our fuel mix - To see how we generate your electricity supply please visit our website.

For an up to date view of our full tariff range please visit our website.

For more information on the environmental impact of your electricity supply write to us at Shell Energy House, Westwood Business Park, Westwood Way, Coventry CV4 8HS.

If you no longer want to receive marketing emails you can unsubscribe here.

PS. You can’t reply to this message so please visit our help and advice pages if you want to learn more. Please access shellenergy.co.uk/email_disclaimer for an important electronic communications disclaimer.

text.content:
{{> _header}}
 
%%[
 
/********** STATIC URLs *******/

    SET @URL_HomePage = "https://www.shellenergy.co.uk"

    SET @URL_ShellHelp = "https://help.shellenergy.co.uk"

    SET @URL_Facebook = "https://www.shellenergy.co.uk/redirect/messenger?channel=MK1InitialGroup1"

    SET @URL_Twitter = "https://www.shellenergy.co.uk/redirect/twitter-dm?channel=MK1InitialGroup1"

    SET @URL_ContactUs = "https://www.shellenergy.co.uk/contact-us"

    SET @URLMyAccount = "https://www.shellenergy.co.uk/login"
 
/***** Start dynamic code - PLEASE DO NOT CHANGE *******/
 
/* Data Extension Names */
 
SET @HistoryDE = "WinterHeatingSolutionsCampaign272"
 

 
/****** Start Web Version behaviour ******/
 
IF or _MessageContext == "Social" or _MessageContext == "FTAF" THEN
 
SET @SubscriberKey = _subscriberkey
 
SET @SubLookup = SubscriberID
 
SET @JobLookup = JobID
 
SET @BatchLookup = _JobSubscriberBatchID
 
/* Some dynamic variables retrieved from the Sendlog */
 
SET @rows = LookupRows("SendLog","SubID",@SubLookup,"JobID",@JobLookup,"BatchID",@BatchLookup, "SubscriberKey", @SubscriberKey)
 
SET @rowCount = rowcount(@rows)
 
IF @rowCount > 0 THEN
 
SET @row = row(@rows,1)
 
SET @BillingAccountId = field(@row,"BillingAccountId")
 
SET @AccountNumber = field(@row,"ExternalAccountId")
 
ENDIF
 
/* Some dynamic variables retrieved from the History */
 
SET @rows = LookupOrderedRows(@HistoryDE,1,"InsertUTCDate DESC","BillingAccountId",@BillingAccountId)
 
IF rowcount(@rows)>0 THEN
 
SET @row = row(@rows,1)
 
SET @FirstName = Field(@row,"FirstName")

ENDIF
 
ELSE
 
/****** DYNAMIC variables retrieved from Entry Source ********/
 
SET @FirstName = AttributeValue("FirstName")
 
SET @BillingAccountId = AttributeValue("BillingAccountId")
 
SET @FuelType = AttributeValue("FuelType")
 
SET @AccountNumber = AttributeValue("ExternalAccountId")
/***** LOG info in Sendlog  ******/
 
SET @EmailName = emailname_
 
SET @Email_Type = "Winter_Campaign_Initial"
 
SET @EmailWebURL = view_email_url
 
SET @SubscriberKey = _subscriberkey
 
SET @SubLookup = SubscriberID
 
SET @JobLookup = JobID
 
SET @BatchLookup = _JobSubscriberBatchID
 
ENDIF

/******  Salutation to be displayed *********/
 SET @Subject = "Don�t forget to pick a new tariff"

IF EMPTY(@Firstname) THEN
 SET @Salutation = "Hello,"
ELSE
 SET @Salutation = CONCAT("Hello ", ProperCase(@Firstname),",")
ENDIF

 SET @PreferencePageID = 903
  SET @URL_PreferenceCentre = CloudPagesURL(@PreferencePageID,'BillingAccountId',@BillingAccountId)

]%%
 
Having trouble seeing this email? Click here
%%view_email_url%%
 to view in your browser.
 
https://www.shellenergy.co.uk
 
https://www.shellenergy.co.uk/boilers-and-heating/boiler-cover
 
Account Number: %%=v(@AccountNumber)=%%
 
%%=v(@Salutation)=%%
 
It’s that time of year when the blankets come out and the radiators go on. But the last thing you want is a nasty bill for
unexpected boiler repairs – or to find yourself with no central
heating at all.
 
We've partnered with one of the leading home experts HomeServe to offer you boiler cover and boiler-replacement services. With HomeServe's boiler cover, you can keep your home running smoothly.
 
Protect your boiler and gas supply pipe from £8 a month and get a free boiler service in your first year.*

Does your boiler need replacing?
 
If your boiler has seen better days and you're thinking about getting a new one, HomeServe offers an easy boiler-replacement service. A new boiler will be more efficient, so you'll waste less energy - lowering your bills.

You'll get a free, personalised video call so HomeServe's Home Experts can check out your current boiler and tell you which one is right for you.

Enjoy peace of mind with a manufacturer-backed warranty† as standard. You can also take your pick from top boiler brands, including Worcester, Bosch and Ideal.

Did you know heating makes up about 53% of your energy bill? Replacing an old G-rated boiler could save you up to £195 a year** on your energy bills.

We understand that a new boiler is a big investment, so HomeServe has a range of flexible payment options to help you find the right boiler for your budget.

https://www.shellenergy.co.uk/boilers-and-heating/boiler-replacement

The Shell Energy Team

Warranty extension from five years to ten years available on Ideal Logic boilers. All warranty extensions are subject to an additional charge. Ten-year warranty extensions are not available on Ideal Mexico or Keston boilers.
